sourcesContent:
import React, {useRef} from "react";
import useOnClickOutside from "../../hooks/useOnClickOutside";
import { faShoppingCart } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'
import './cart.css'
import { Wrapper, Icon, CartCount,CartSideBar, EmptyCart, SideBarHeader,
Card,
CardBody,
CardImage,
CardRemove,
CardRow,
CardTitle,
ClearButton,
CheckoutButton,
RemoveButton,
} from './Styles'

export default function Cart({isToggle, setToggle, carts, removeProductFromCart, clearCart, addProductToCart}){
    const $sideBarRef = useRef();

    useOnClickOutside($sideBarRef, () => setToggle(false));

    return <>
        <Wrapper onClick ={() => setToggle(true)}>
            <Icon style={{paddingLeft:70}} src={"https://www.pngkey.com/png/full/134-1344540_free-shopping-cart-png-small-shopping-cart-icon.png"}></Icon>
            <CartCount>{carts.length}</CartCount>
        </Wrapper>

        <CartSideBar ref={$sideBarRef} className={isToggle ? "expand" : "shrink"}>
            <SideBarHeader>Your Cart</SideBarHeader>
            {carts.length === 0 ? (
                <EmptyCart>Empty Cart</EmptyCart>
            ): (
                carts.map(({product, quantity}) => (
                <Card key = {product.id}>
                    <CardImage src={product.imageURL} />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardRow>
                            <CardTitle style={{textAlign: "left", fontWeight:"bold"}}>{product.title}</CardTitle>
                        </CardRow>
                        
                        <CardRow>
                            <CardTitle style={{textAlign: "left"}}>Total Quantity ({quantity}) : ${product.price * quantity}</CardTitle>
                            
                        </CardRow>
                            <button style={{borderRadius: 9, backgroundColor:"white"}} onClick={() => removeProductFromCart(product.id)}>-</button>
                            <button style={{borderRadius: 9, backgroundColor:"white"}} onClick={() => addProductToCart(product.id)}>+</button>
                    </CardBody>
                    </Card>
                    ))
            )}

            {carts.length !== 0 && (
                <ClearButton onClick={() => clearCart()}>Clear Cart</ClearButton>
            )}
        </CartSideBar>
    
    </>
    
}
